title: Fewer lost files with Vista desktop search
text:
Vista Tips 'Search Bar' Microsoft has finally integrated a full desktop search facility into Windows, which is designed to ensure you never lose a file again.We spoke to Microsoft Australia's Paul Randle for these tips and tricks.

Microsoft has finally integrated a full desktop search facility into Windows, which is designed to ensure you never lose a file again.

We spoke to Microsoft Australia's Paul Randle for these tips and tricks.

Click here to return to the ZDNet Australia Windows Vista 10 top tricks and tips page.
